I've started playing Cs:Go from 2017 or 2016.Someone recommend this game so now i recommend to all of you.The game is now free so u can all play this nice game made by Valve.And if you boring of competitive or casual or deathmach/wigman etc you can join community servers.This is all your choice.Try CS:GO you will not believe how good it is for an FREE game. 
This game is competitive so you have to work on your aim and movement.
The first thing i would say to a guide is how to strafe because its probably the most important thing.
Updates are still going on this game such as operations.


The only negative part of this game is that the anticheats are weak and can easily be exploited by many people, so the players that try to play this game without buying it will have a rough time and probably start cheating.

Overall this game is a legend and its worth playing it!
Çıkışından bu kadar uzun zaman geçmesine rağmen hala rakibi bile olmayan online, rekabetçi, fps oyunu.

КС это первоклассный шутер, который покорил сердца многих ещё с 1.6. 2 команды, 1 карта, 1 цель, 1 победитель. Неудивительно, что данная игра была включена в киберспортивную дисциплину и стала одной из самых популярных. Для любителей шутеров это игра на первом месте!!!
Игра вроде бы и хороша, но блять, эти ЧИТЕРЫ, не дают покоя. Короче, рекомендую, без читеров прям заебумба.
It's a great, fun game and is very rewarding to learn if you can get a 4 stack or 5 stack. I do not recommend solo queue as it is basically a dice roll.
